titles.title: Restoring Fairness to Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2020
Restoring Fairness to Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2020
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to sunset the increased FMAP for medical assistance for newly eligible mandatory individuals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Restoring Fairness to Medicaid Reimbursement Act of 2020
This bill eliminates, beginning in 2021, the increased Federal Medical Assistance Percentage (i.e., federal matching rate) that currently applies to coverage of the Medicaid expansion population (i.e., adults under the age of 65 who are newly eligible through Medicaid expansion under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act).
